stanza.line: What is your substance whereof are you mademade
That millions of strange shadows on you tendtend
Since every one hath every one one shadeshade
And you but one can every shadow lendlend
On Helen cheek all art of beauty setset
And you in Grecian tires are painted newnew
Speak of the spring and foison of the yearyear
The one doth shadow of your beauty showshow
The other as your bounty doth appearappear
And you in every blessed shape we knowknow
In all external grace you have some partpart
But you like none none you for constant heartheart
